summary: Small player home located on a mountain road from Whiterun to Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]- Description -[/size][/color]

[size=3]A secluded small player cabin home, thats on the mountain road that goes past the Whiterun Stormcloak camp to Ivarstead.
The previous owner has the key, find him, he didn't get far from the cabin (got hit by minor rockfall)
[/size]
[size=3]2 different files:
-[color=#6fa8dc] [u]Snowdin Cabin[/u][/color]: doesn't have any smithing stations
- [u][color=#6fa8dc]Snowdin Cabin (WM Storage)[/color][/u]: doesn't have any smithing stations, but has an option to buy a storage
at the Warmaidens in Whiterun for 250 gold, has a magic box (Storage) and a magic box connection
(Cabin inside, above the door) that connects them
[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=3][u]ALL DLCs ARE REQUIRED[/u][/size][/color]

[size=3]Different texture and lighting mods were used in the screenshots[/size]

[youtube]ktJl6MFlK_g[/youtube][youtube]wXOt_skhAsY[/youtube]
[size=3]Video made by: Hodilton and Chabal[/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=5]- Features -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Navmeshed inside and out + cleaned
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Custom made and named storage
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Horse marker and a lot of idle markers for followers
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Spare bed, and a pull out chair option
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Smithing storage in Whiterun (2nd file)
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] 2 unique items: Snow Axe (2H) and Snow Amulet found in the cabin
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] 3 weapon racks, 3 weapon plaques, 4 shield plaques and 1 mannequin[/size]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][size=5][/size][/url][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -[/url][/size][size=5][b][/b][/size]

[size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod[/size][/font][/center]
author: 1xmiha
